entries.cannot_use: It appears you are NOT certified to use the ship you are about to buy.  Are you sure you want to complete this transaction?
entries.can_use: It appears you are certified to use the ship you are about to buy.  Are you sure you want to complete this transaction?
entries.not_certified: You would not be able to fly that ship if you unpacked it.
entries.not_in_inv: The blueprints you are trying to convert are not in your inventory.  I cannot work with these.
entries.succeed: You successfully add a ship control device to your datapad.
entries.inv_full: You would have no room for these blueprints if I gave them to you.
entries.no_deeds: Oh, I'm sorry, but you don't seem to be carrying any valid ship blueprints.
entries.too_many_pobs: You already have one multi-person craft in your datapad.  You do not have room for another.
entries.bought_chassis: Congratulations on your purchase.  Happy flying!
entries.no_money: You don't have enough money for that purchase.  Stop wasting my time.
entries.already_have: You already have too many ships!
entries.buy_ship_prompt: Please select a ship chassis you would like to purchase.
